item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>I wouldn't be able to retire on the revenue, it basically pays for the domain name and a bit of experimentation with advertising such as the Million Dollar Homepage thing.</p><p>So far the revenue is running at about twice that of Adsense. Not sure if it will continue, only a week or so in, we'll see over a few months what the difference is.</p>
item.content:encoded:
I wouldn’t be able to retire on the revenue, it basically pays for the domain name and a bit of experimentation with advertising such as the Million Dollar Homepage thing.

So far the revenue is running at about twice that of Adsense. Not sure if it will continue, only a week or so in, we’ll see over a few months what the difference is.

item.title: By: Sarah
item.dc:creator: Sarah
item.description: <p>You actually get revenue? ;)</p><p>Btw, nice blog you've got here...I'm gonna blogroll you!</p>
item.content:encoded:
